text: Cryoturris albida is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mangeliidae.Adams, Charles Baker. "Specierum novarum conchyliorum." Jamaica repertorum, synopsis. Proceedings of the Boston Society of Natural History 2.1 (1845): 17. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species can be found off Jamaica ==References== ==External links== * Worldwide Molluscs Species Data Base: Cryoturris albida albida
title: Cryoturris albida
